title: Too Much Spam
content: Here we go again with the spammers taking over our forums - who is watching the store - this almost killed this board off the last time. Help!
author: bojev

comments.content:
I can only nuke spam within threads, or modify them. It pains me that I can't Unpublish a thread and then bounce the offender ...I do what I can. I have no idea who else is helping out.

I'm here in the EST and check on each forum, including Blogs about three times a day...

I would happily help with that moderation if allowed by the owner of this site. I visit Build and General Discussions fairly often on a daily basis, and TypeID less frequently -- and I hate spam.

If you need a new mod for that purpose -- and that only -- all you have to do is ask me.
Thanks for your work fighting spam, 5star.
